title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Identify the specific features and functionalities that will be included in the Predictive Analytics Engine.

title: Design the Predictive Analytics Engine Architecture
description: Create a high-level design of the system that outlines the main components and their interactions.

title: Develop User Interface for Predictive Analytics Engine
description: Design and implement the frontend interface of the system that allows users to input data, run predictions, and analyze results.
dependencies: Design the Predictive Analytics Engine Architecture

title: Develop Backend Services for Predictive Analytics Engine
description: Implement the backend services that handle data processing, prediction algorithms, and other business logic.
dependencies: Design the Predictive Analytics Engine Architecture

title: Integrate Database and Data Storage Solutions
description: Choose appropriate databases and data storage solutions for storing and retrieving data from the Predictive Analytics Engine.
dependencies: Design the Predictive Analytics Engine Architecture

title: Implement DevOps Pipeline and Deployment Strategy
description: Develop a continuous integration/continuous deployment pipeline and a deployment strategy for the Predictive Analytics Engine.
dependencies: Design the Predictive Analytics Engine Architecture

title: Perform Quality Assurance and Testing
description: Test the system for functional correctness, performance, security, and user experience.
dependencies: Develop User Interface for Predictive Analytics Engine
Develop Backend Services for Predictive Analytics Engine
Integrate Database and Data Storage Solutions
Implement DevOps Pipeline and Deployment Strategy

title: Review Requirements and Design Documents
description: Review the project requirements and design documents to ensure they meet business needs and technical feasibility.
dependencies: Design the Predictive Analytics Engine Architecture

title: Review User Interface Design and Implementation
description: Review the user interface design and implementation to ensure it meets usability standards and aligns with the project goals.
dependencies: Develop User Interface for Predictive Analytics Engine

title: Review Backend Services Implementation
description: Review the backend services implementation to ensure it adheres to the design and meets technical requirements.
dependencies: Develop Backend Services for Predictive Analytics Engine
